title: Car Chase
fullContent: Home› DrivingCar ChaseBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenCar Chase is a fun game where you drive to escape from the police. Take your mini car on an epic mission but don't forget to collect cash money. The police cars will try to hit your car but there is a repair bonus on the road that can save your car from destruction.Don't waste any second and come to play for fun and excitement.Car Chase Controls:• AD or left/right arrow to steer• Esc to pauseThis article was updated on February 20, 20241 Player3DCarDrivingEscapeFreePoliceSpeedTraffic
